channel.title: CVE Feed for sanrl -- RabbitLoader – Website Speed Optimization for improving Core Web Vital metrics with Cache, Image Optimization, and more
channel.description: The latest CVEs for sanrl -- RabbitLoader – Website Speed Optimization for improving Core Web Vital metrics with Cache, Image Optimization, and more

item.title: CVE-2024-8800|2024-10-02T18:17:25.210Z -- sanrl -- rabbitloader%20%E2%80%93%20website%20speed%20optimization%20for%20improving%20core%20web%20vital%20metrics%20with%20cache%2C%20image%20optimization%2C%20and%20more
item.description: The RabbitLoader – Website Speed Optimization for improving Core Web Vital metrics with Cache, Image Optimization, and more plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.21.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-8800|2024-10-02T07:35:29.525Z -- sanrl -- rabbitloader%20%E2%80%93%20website%20speed%20optimization%20for%20improving%20core%20web%20vital%20metrics%20with%20cache%2C%20image%20optimization%2C%20and%20more
item.description: The RabbitLoader – Website Speed Optimization for improving Core Web Vital metrics with Cache, Image Optimization, and more plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 2.21.0. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.
